articles.description: Moving Out is a ridiculously rowdy co-op game for up to four players who have to get everything out of a house, move it onto the truck, and if a few things get broken? It’s just the cost of doing business.
articles.content:
Ive been friends with the same group of folks since high school, and weve moved each others belongings from house to dorm to apartment to house to house to house more times than I can count. 
Youd think wed have it down to a science by now, but, as my friend… [+5030 chars]
